title: WHAT IS A WIND TUNNEL?
description: [EN] An aerodynamic wind tunnel (AWT) is a technical device designed to simulate the effects of the environment on objects moving through it.

mishustin.name: [EN] Mikhail Vladimirovich Mishustin
mishustin.title: [EN] Chairman of the Government of Russia
mishustin.quote: [EN] In accordance with the base scenario of the Strategy for the Development of Unmanned Aviation of the Russian Federation for the period up to 2030, it is necessary to train 1 million workers in the UAV sector by 2030.
